content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Water Supply System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5), storage tank (position x=-6.5, y=-0.5) and pipes connecting them

### Crude Oil Extraction and Processing at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack (position x=17.5, y=40.5), oil refinery (position x=22.5, y=42.5), petroleum gas storage tank (position x=27.5, y=42.5) and pipes connecting them

### Sulfur Production at position(31.5, 43.5)
Consists of chemical plant (position x=31.5, y=43.5) connected to water supply system and petroleum gas storage tank via pipes

### Electricity Generation at position(27.5, 46.0)
Consists of boiler (position x=27.5, y=46.0), steam engine (position x=31.5, y=48.5) and pipes connecting them

### Power Network
Consists of small electric poles connecting pumpjack, oil refinery, chemical plant, boiler and steam engine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are within a reasonable distance before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities with insufficient spacing or incorrect direction
- Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction when placing entities next to existing ones to avoid collisions.

### Errors when connecting entities without fluid in the source
- Ensure the source entity has fluid in it before attempting to connect it to another entity that requires fluid input.

### Errors when attempting to connect entities that are not in the same fluid system
- Ensure that the entities you are trying to connect are in the same fluid system or have a valid connection path.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables used in the code are defined before they are used.

### Errors when attempting to place an entity at an occupied position
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler directly
- Ensure that the offshore pump and boiler are connected via a valid pipe network.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent in the given logs. Therefore, this section is not included.
